resources.string: Report a problem
Submit
Reports aren’t end-to-end encrypted.\nDon’t include sensitive info.
Include logs
A log shows all actions that led to an error.\nWe use it only to help fix bugs.
Summary (required)
Example: The Mail app crashes when opening emails with large attachments.
This field must be more than 10 characters long.
Expected results
Example: Opening the email should show the message content and the attachments.
Steps to reproduce

Example:
1. Find an email with a large attachment (ex: video)
2. Open the email
3. Wait for the email to load
Actual results
Example: The Mail app crashes when opening emails with large attachments.
Are you sure you want to leave this screen?
Any information you\'ve entered will be lost.
Cancel
Close
Thank you for your report, our customer support will reach out.
An error occurred. Please try again.
You are currently offline. Please try again with internet connection.
